synopsis:
Animated 2002 short film produced by Studio Ghibli for their near exclusive use in the Ghibli Museum. It features famous director Miyazaki Hayao himself as narrator (in the form of a humanoid pig, reminiscent of Porco from Porco Rosso), telling the story of flight and the many machines imagined to achieve it.
Note: The film could also be seen on the in-flight entertainment system used by Japan Airlines.
(Source: AniDB)
